languages.text:
Wielder's armour Dodge Penalty is reduced by 10% (medium 25=>15, heavy 50=>40).
On wielder's Agility >= 60, it's reduced by 15% instead.

traits.locale_text:
Wielder's armour Dodge Penalty is reduced by 10% (medium 25=>15, heavy 50=>40).
On wielder's Agility >= 60, it's reduced by 15% instead.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −10%.
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is 60 or more, that penalty is reduced by −15% instead.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Штраф{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} персонажа уменьшается на 10%.
Если {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} персонажа больше или равна 60, этот штраф уменьшается на 15%.

traits.locale_text:
Dodge penalty of the wearer's armour is reduced by −10%.
If the wearer's Agility is 60 or more, that penalty is reduced by −15% instead.

languages.text:
Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} %10 azalır.
Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği 60 veya üstündeyse bu ceza puanı %15 azalır.

{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −10%.

traits.locale_text:
Giyen kişinin zırhının kaçınma ceza puanı %10 azalır.
Giyen kişinin Çeviklik niteliği 60 veya üstündeyse bu ceza puanı %15 azalır.

Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} %10 azalır.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del portador se reduce en un −10 %.
Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del portador es de 60 o más, en vez de eso la penalización se reduce en un −15 %.

If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is 60 or more, that penalty is reduced by −15% instead.

traits.locale_text:
La penalización a la esquiva de la armadura del portador se reduce en un −10 %.
Si la Agilidad del portador es de 60 o más, en vez de eso la penalización se reduce en un −15 %.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del portador se reduce en un −10 %.
Si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del portador es de 60 o más, en vez de eso la penalización se reduce en un −15 %.

languages.text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}降低10%。
如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}不低于60，则护甲造成的闪避减值降低15%。

If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is 60 or more, that penalty is reduced by −15% instead.

languages.text:

Beträgt die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Trägers 60 oder mehr, wird der Abzug stattdessen um –15 % verringert.

traits.locale_text:

Beträgt die Beweglichkeit des Trägers 60 oder mehr, wird der Abzug stattdessen um –15 % verringert.

languages.text:

Si l'Agilité du porteur est égale ou supérieure à 60, cette pénalité est réduite de -15 %.
